structure.unit: ARTICLE III. DADE COUNTY VESSEL MOORING CODE

text.section:
Sec. 7-39. Safety inspections; qualified.
No officer shall board any vessel to make a safety inspection if the owner or operator is not aboard. When the owner or operator is aboard an officer may board a vessel with consent or when he has probable cause or knowledge to believe that a violation of a provision of this article has occurred or is occurring.
